entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
